title: Smut Volume 2

This paperback collection presents 20 examples of Nerve.com's most talked-about fiction plus arresting photos. More fearless, forthright, and provocative than typical "erotica," Smut: Volume 2 collects the most arousing stories and enticing photos from some of today's most talented writers and photographers.
